technologies.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating and structuring content on the web
CSS is a style sheet language used to control the layout and appearance of web pages
JavaScript is a dynamic programming language used to create interactive effects within web browsers
TypeScript is a strongly typed superset of JavaScript that adds static types to the language
React Js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, focusing on the view layer of web applications
Redux Js is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps, often used with React for state management
Node Js is a runtime environment that allows developers to run JavaScript on the server-side
Express Js is a minimalist web framework for Node Js, designed for building web applications and APIs
GitHub is a platform for version control and collaboration, allowing developers to manage and share code
MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents
MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system known for its reliability and performance
PostgreSQL is an advanced open-source relational database system with a focus on extensibility and SQL compliance

projects.heading: Global Counseling & Information Centre for Online & Distance Education.
projects.description: Prerna Academy is a Global Counseling & Information Centre for Online & Distance Education that helps students secure admissions to their preferred universities through established partnerships. The platform also offers comprehensive administrative tools to enhance operational efficiency and support overall management.

projects.heading: Insurance Management for Vehicles and Cattle
projects.description: Insurance Management System is designed to streamline the processes of vehicle and cattle insurance, offering a seamless experience for policyholders. The platform features internal modules for insurance registration, incident reporting, and claims management, ensuring efficient handling of insurance needs.

projects.heading: Human Resource Management Tool with Internal Job Portal
projects.description: Our Human Resource Management Tool streamlines HR processes, enabling organizations to efficiently manage employee records, attendance, payroll, and performance evaluations. Designed with user-friendliness in mind, the tool also features an internal job portal that connects employees with new opportunities within the organization, fostering career growth and talent retention.

projects.heading: Hornbill Vacations: Promoting Kerala Tourism and Wellness
projects.description: Hornbill Vacations, a division of Capere Grandios, is dedicated to marketing and promoting the rich tourism offerings of Kerala. The platform provides curated day-wise packages to explore the region's stunning attractions while also featuring Ayurveda services to enhance wellness experiences.
